title: Demographic Inference on {T}witter using Recursive Neural Networks
authors:
Kim, Sunghwan Mac  and
Xu, Qiongkai  and
Qu, Lizhen  and
Wan, Stephen  and
Paris, C{\'e}cile
venue: Proceedings of the 55th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (Volume 2: Short Papers)
abstract: In social media, demographic inference is a critical task in order to gain a better understanding of a cohort and to facilitate interacting with oneâ€™s audience. Most previous work has made independence assumptions over topological, textual and label information on social networks. In this work, we employ recursive neural networks to break down these independence assumptions to obtain inference about demographic characteristics on Twitter. We show that our model performs better than existing models including the state-of-the-art.
